text: Ani sevati kaya sababa ahe ki amhi sarvasrestha allahavara bharosa na thevava? Vastavika tyaneca amhala amaca marga dakhavila ahe ani je duhkha tumhi amhala pohocavala, amhi tyavara niscitaca dhira-sanyama rakhu. Bharosa thevanaryansathi heca yogya ahe ki tyanni allahavaraca bharosa thevala pahije
